d%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253Ch3%253ESwitch%2520Disabled%253C%252Fh3%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253Cp%253EEstado%253A%2520%2540Status3%253C%252Fp%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253CSDKSwitch%2520%2540bind-Value%253D%2522%2540Status3%2522%2520Disabled%253D%2522true%2522%252F%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253C%252FSDKCard%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253C%252Fdiv%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253Cdiv%2520class%253D%2522col-md-6%2520p-3%2522%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253CSDKCard%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253Ch3%253ESwitch%2520Value%2520Change%253C%252Fh3%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253Cp%253EEstado%253A%2520%2540StatusChange%253C%252Fp%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253CSDKSwitch%2520Value%253D%2540StatusChange%2520ValueChanged%253D%2522%28%28Status2%29%2520%253D%253E%2520Onchange%28Status2%29%29%2522%252F%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253C%252FSDKCard%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%253C%252Fdiv%253E%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%253C%252Fdiv%253E%250A%253C%252Fdiv%253E%250A%2540code%250A%257B%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520bool%2520Status%253B%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520bool%2520Status3%253B%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520bool%2520StatusChange%253B%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520public%2520void%2520Onchange%28bool%2520Status2%29%257B%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520StatusChange%2520%253D%2520Status2%253B%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520if%2520%28StatusChange%29%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2
